alert.note: Alert for Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Yadkin County through 900 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nebo, or over Boonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boonville... East Bend... Nebo... Enon... and Donnaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
